content.question: Which of the following statements is true about the model and the estimates produced by the model that correspond to <math alttext="A"> <mi>A</mi> </math> and <math alttext="B"><mi>B</mi></math> ?

choices.label: The model produces an overestimate at <math alttext="A"><mi>A</mi></math> and an underestimate at <math alttext="B"><mi>B</mi></math>. Based on the absolute values of the residuals, there is a greater error in the model with <math alttext="B"><mi>B</mi></math> than with <math alttext="A"><mi>A</mi></math>.

The model produces an underestimate at <math alttext="A"><mi>A</mi></math> and an overestimate at <math alttext="B"><mi>B</mi></math>. Based on the absolute values of the residuals, there is a greater error in the model with <math alttext="B"><mi>B</mi></math> than with <math alttext="A"><mi>A</mi></math>.

The model produces an overestimate at <math alttext="A"><mi>A</mi></math> and an underestimate at <math alttext="B"><mi>B</mi></math>. Based on the absolute values of the residuals, there is a greater error in the model with <math alttext="A"><mi>A</mi></math> than with <math alttext="B"><mi>B</mi></math>.

The model produces an underestimate at <math alttext="A"><mi>A</mi></math> and an overestimate at <math alttext="B"><mi>B</mi></math>. Based on the absolute values of the residuals, there is a greater error in the model with <math alttext="A"><mi>A</mi></math> than with <math alttext="B"><mi>B</mi></math>.

content.answer: The model produces an underestimate at <math alttext="A"><mi>A</mi></math> and an overestimate at <math alttext="B"><mi>B</mi></math>. Based on the absolute values of the residuals, there is a greater error in the model with <math alttext="B"><mi>B</mi></math> than with <math alttext="A"><mi>A</mi></math>.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
